naslov: Kuća 1 km od mora: Savudrija, 345.00 m2 (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se kuća na parceli ukupne povrsine 425m2.Kuća je legalizirana te sa uporabnom dozvolom ( rijesenjem o izvedenom stanju). Ukupne bruto tlocrtne povrsine od 345,89m2 odnosno 330m2 neto.U dvorištu su 2 do 3 parkirna mjesta, okucnica cca 100 m2 uz mogucnost prosirenja, cestica granici sa pasnjakom u vlasnistu drzave. Predmetna cestica se sastoji od P+1. Kuca nije etazirana. Prizemni dio zgrade sastoji se od 2 odvojene, te međusobno isto tako povezane stambene jedinice sa zasebnim ulazima. Stanovi mogu biti koristeni u cijelosti od 170m2 ili kao 2 odvojena stana cca slicnih povrsina. Stanovi se mogu odvojiti dvostrukim pomicnim zidom koj zatvoren sacinjava veliku garderobnu sobu ili ostavu. Stanovi se sastoje od: Stan 1 Dnevni boravak sa kuhinjom, hodnik, kupatilo, spavaca soba, te garderobna soba/ostava. Stan2 Dnevni boravak sa odvojenom kuhinjom i blagavonom, 2 spavace sobe, 1 kupatilo, hodnik, nadkrivena vanjska terasa sa stolovima i stolicama. Kuca posjeduje 3 dimnjaka za skoro sve vrste grijanja, ukljucuci ugljeni kamen. Zgrada je dijelomicno zavrsena te prizemlje je namjesteno, te upotrebljivo. Potrebno je napraviti jos zavrsnu izolazciju te fasadu. Katni dio je visoko zavrsen sa provucenim instalacijama. Sa prizemlja te sa kata nekretnina pruza pogled prema moru/svijetioniku Savudrija, alpama. Nekretnina je na jako mirnoj te atraktivnoj lokaciji: ( Daleko od ceste, daleko od bilo kakvih clubova/diskoteka) manje od 1km od mora ( Kanegra / Crveni Vrh) 1-2km od Kempinski Hotela Adriatic, te Petram resorta, golf club etc. 90km od 3 Internacionala aeorodroma. --- A house is for sale on a plot of 425m2. The house is legalized and has a use permit (decision on the completed condition). Total gross floor area of ​​345.89m2 or 330m2 net. In the yard there are 2 to 3 parking spaces, a garden of approximately 100 m2 with the possibility of expansion, a plot bordering a pasture owned by the state. The plot in question consists of P+1. The house is not divided into condominiums. The ground floor of the building consists of 2 separate, and also interconnected residential units with separate entrances. The apartments can be used as a whole of 170m2 or as 2 separate apartments of approximately similar areas. The apartments can be separated by a double movable wall which, when closed, forms a large dressing room or storage room. The apartments consist of: Apartment 1 Living room with kitchen, hallway, bathroom, bedroom, and wardrobe/storage room. Apartment 2 Living room with separate kitchen and dining room, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, hallway, covered outdoor terrace with tables and chairs. The house has 3 chimneys for almost all types of heating, including coal stone. The building is partially finished and the ground floor is furnished and usable. It is necessary to make the final insulation and the facade. The floor part is highly finished with threaded installations. From the ground floor and from the first floor, the property offers a view of the sea/lighthouse of Savudrija, the Alps. The property is in a very quiet and attractive location: (Far from the road, far from any clubs/discos) less than 1 km from the sea (Kanegra / Crveni Vrh) 1-2 km from Kempinski Hotel Adriatic, and Petram resort, golf club, etc. 90 km from 3 International Airport.
